TITLE: 【Request】Start

# Request Start

A Request represents a single intention or desire.
This issue defines the background, discussion, and exit condition of this request.


## 1. Background

- Why did this request emerge?

## 2. Current Situation

- What is now happening?

## 3. Desired Outcome
- What should be true when this is complete?

## 4. Hypotheses / Investigation Notes
- Possible causes
- Areas to inspect
- Reference documents (README, code paths, etc.)

## 5. Possible Approaches

- Option A
- Option B

## 6. Exit Condition
- Condition that defines completion

## 7. Task Checklist
- [ ] Investigation completed
- [ ] Implementation completed
- [ ] Verification completed

## Notes
